item.title: About
item.description: Hi there. Welcome to my corner of the interwebs. My name is Collins Huff. I’m a software engineer. In December 2018, I graduated from the University of Virginia, While there, I studied Math and Computer Science. Since then I’ve been working at Counterflow, a network security startup in the Charlottesville, Virginia area. I’m currently looking for a new job, so if you would like to hire me, check out my resume and shoot me an email.
